main.name: Ville Martas
main.bio: I'm Ville, a Master's degree software engineering student at LUT-University. I have experience from React/Express from different projects and I've also delved into the basics of Unity (C#) and Unreal Engine (C++/Blueprints) development. Right now I'm familiarizing myself with the .NET stack by learning Blazor. I'm open to work, you can contact me via phone or email!
main.contactmessage: Parhaiten minuun saa yhteyden soittamalla tai sähköpostiviestillä.

education.degree: Master's degree student in Software Engineering

education.description: During my high school years I spent one year at Örebro, Sweden as an exhance student.

work.title: Off-Trade Sales promoter
work.description: During the summer seasons I worked at multiple supermarkets around southern Finland maintaining and ordering Sinebrychoff products in cooperation with the shopkeepers.

work.title: Assistant teacher
work.description: I worked as a assistant teacher during the reading vacation (lukuloma) before the finals

work.title: Cashier / Storage worker
work.description: Customer service and storage work in the store of the petrol station ABC.

work.title: Caddiemaster
work.description: During summers 2011 and 2012 I worked at a golf course near my home. I did both caddiemaster office work and physical field work.

other.title: Part of a team handling business relationships
other.description: Cooperation and sponsorships of Cluster and different companies.

other.title: Contact person for TEK (Tekniikan Akateemiset)
other.description: Middleman between the university guild Cluster and Tekniikan Akateemiset

other.title: Host of the guild
other.description: Organized different events and worked with hosts and hostesses of other guilds.

other.title: Student
other.description: Reserve officer training during my military service

projects.title: Linvasion (Linnunrata Invasion)
projects.category: Into the Breach inspired turn-based game created with Unity/C#, 3d-models with Blender. I'm currently working on refactoring and rebuilding this project.

projects.title: KyykkaVR
projects.category: Prototype of Virtual Reality simulator of finnish skittles. Created with Unreal Engine 4.26 by mostly using Blueprints.

projects.title: SimpleShooter
projects.category: Created with C++ and extended a bit with Blueprints. Part of GameDev.tv's Unreal Engine course. Map created for fun.

projects.title: Postified
projects.category: Microblogging service course project created with React/Express. School project.

projects.title: Bachelor's thesis
projects.category: Research of integrating the wearable haptic suit Teslasuit to VR-worlds.

projects.title: Sudoku Solver
projects.category: Small weekend project. Solver created with python that solves any (solvable) sudoku.

projects.title: Bank application
projects.category: Course project made with Android Studio/Java.
